pkg.engine

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • pkg.engine.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Game sprite class. Supports animation, offsets, blend modes and opacity.

    • Field Summary

      javafx.scene.image.ImageView img

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(java.lang.String img_arg,
              int frh_arg,
              int frv_arg,
              int offx_arg,
              int offy_arg)
        Long constructor. Use this if you want to load image from file.
        Parameters:
        img_arg - Image name.
        frh_arg - Amount of horizontal frames.
        frv_arg - Amount of vertical frames.
        offx_arg - Horizontal offset.
        offy_arg - Vertical offset.

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(Sprite spr_arg)
        Short constructor. Copies previously created sprite. Works well with Spr.
        Parameters:
        spr_arg -
